basic_information.scholarship_name: Steward Family Endowed Scholarship in Sociology

description: The Steward Family Endowed Scholarship in Sociology was created in honor of the Steward family and the role of education in contributing to the greater good as well as improving the life chances of individuals. The power of education to transform lives is at the heart of this scholarship. This scholarship recognizes a sociology major who demonstrates financial need and an unwavering commitment to higher education and the discipline of sociology. Eligibility Requirements Declared Sociology major Full-time student Minimum 2.5 GPA Brief statement explaining financial need and/or special circumstances

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
